summary.para: The SCHANNEL_ALG structure contains algorithm and key size information. It is used as the structure passed as pbData in when dwParam is set to KP_SCHANNEL_ALG.
Indicates the use of derived keys. The following values can be used.

description.para: Derive keys to create or verify SSL MAC signatures.
Derive keys to encrypt or decrypt data.

summary.para: Algorithms used with the derived keys. Note that no algorithm will be specified unless earlier obtained from the CSP by enumeration.
SCHANNEL_MAC_KEYs can be either MD5 or SHA.
SCHANNEL_ENC_KEYs can be RC4, DES, 3DES, or RC2.
Size in bits of the derived keys.
This flag can be set to INTERNATIONAL_USAGE (0x00000001), indicating that derived keys must follow SSL export rules.
Reserved for future use. Should be set to zero.
